channel.title: Workshop / event landing page on Helmholtz Imaging Workshop Template
channel.description: Recent content in Workshop / event landing page on Helmholtz Imaging Workshop Template

item.title: My awesome workshop
item.description: Introduction What this presentation provides: Demo page for Helmholtz Imaging workshops based on markdown format Examples of special elements which can be used in a presentation Presentation metadata The frontmatter of a workshop markdown file provides metadata used to print the title slide. Slide separation Slides in markdown are separated by --- lines. Headers Subheaders Use markdown headers to define slide headers. A table of content will automatically be rendered from the first header on each slide.
